sense.def: Illness Sign of tooth decay resulting from tooth worms. Pu ji fang 普濟方 67: 上（銅綠、生白礬、 膽礬、麝香）為細末，研勻，上牙蝕處 , “The above-mentioned substances, tong lü , unprocessed bai fan , dan fan , she xiang , are to be finely ground and evenly mixed to be applied to the location of tooth erosion ”. Ya si 壓死 , [appearance of] death from being crushed [4]

Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, resulting from accidentally being crushed by a heavy object. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 18: 凡墜、壓死者 , 急安好處 , 以手袖 掩其口鼻上一食頃 , 眼開 , 先與熱小便 , 若初覺氣能言 , 急掰開口以熱小便灌 之 , “In all cases of [an appearance of] death from a fall or from being crushed , quickly take [the victim] to a safe place. Then cover the [victim’s] mouth and nose with your sleeve as long as it takes to have a meal. When the eyes open, at once pour hot urine [into his mouth]. When he is just regaining consciousness and is capable of speaking, pry his mouth apart with your hands and forcibly instill hot urine into him”.
